sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT [WATERMARK]
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where TABLE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}'
  and DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'

Select max([Sys_RowNumber]) as NewWatermark FROM [edw_@{pipeline().globalParameters.gpm_Environment}].[@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ViewName}]
where Sys_RowNumber > @{variables('v_Watermark')}

SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME
  FROM [adf].[CT_VUZION_FINANCE_TABLES]
  where DATABASE_NAME = 'sqldb-azureinvoices-prod'

SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME
  FROM [adf].[CT_VUZION_FINANCE_TABLES]
  where DATABASE_NAME = 'portal'

SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME
  FROM [adf].[CT_VUZION_FINANCE_TABLES]
  where DATABASE_NAME = 'sqldb-pricelist-prod'

SELECT * FROM [dbo].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}] WHERE cast([EffectiveStartDate] as date) >= '@{variables('UpdateDate')}' OR (cast([EffectiveEndDate] as date) >= '@{variables('UpdateDate')}' AND cast([EffectiveEndDate] as date) <= '@{variables('EndDate')}')

SELECT 
      [TABLE_NAME]
      ,[COLUMN_NAME]
 
      ,[WATERMARK] as WATERMARK_current
  FROM [adf].[CT_CLOUDBLUE_PBA_TABLES]
  where [TABLE_NAME] = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_TableName}'
  and COLUMN_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_ColumnName}'

SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME, WATERMARK
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'
SELECT COUNT(timestamp) AS rows FROM dbo.[@{item().TABLE_NAME}] WHERE cast([timestamp] as bigint) > @{item().WATERMARK}

SELECT cast([timestamp] as bigint) as [Sys_RowNumber], @{replace(activity('Get SQL Query').output.value[0].QUERY, '&', '&')} FROM dbo.[@{item().TABLE_NAME}] WHERE cast([timestamp] as bigint) > @{item().WATERMARK}
Select MAX(cast([timestamp] as bigint)) as NewWatermark FROM [dbo].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]

WITH QUERY_CTE AS 

(SELECT(SELECT concat('[', COLUMN_NAME, '] as [', replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(replace(COLUMN_NAME, '&', '') ,' ',''),'(',''),')',''),',',''),';',''),'{',''),'}',''), ']') + ',' AS 'data()'
FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS
WHERE TABLE_NAME = '@{item().TABLE_NAME}' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo'
FOR XML PATH('')) AS QUERY)

SELECT substring(QUERY, 1, LEN(QUERY)-1) AS QUERY
FROM QUERY_CTE
